alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 3:53PM AKST until December 17 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds will increase tonight and remain strong into Sunday morning. This will cause blowing snow and low visibility over treeless summits such as near Finger Mountain. Winds will decrease Sunday afternoon and visibility will improve then.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
